summary: American Airlines is the biggest airline in the world, based in Texas, USA. It flies to almost 350 places in 48 countries, with around 6,800 flights daily. Together with its partners, it's part of an alliance called Oneworld. Its regional flights are under the American Eagle brand. American Airlines uses 10 main airports, with Dallas/Fort Worth as its largest. Each year, they carry over 200 million passengers, with more than 500,000 people flying with them every day. As of 2023, they have over 100,000 employees.
title: American Airlines
